name: ormSearchOffline
description: Performs search on the indexed properties but returns only the stored fields. For this function to work, specify indexStore=true on the properties on which you want to perform the search.

params.name: query_text
params.description: The text to be searched for or a complete Lucene query. For details of Lucene query, see http://lucene.apache.org/core/old_versioned_docs/versions/.

params.name: entityName
params.description: Name of the entity to be searched.

params.name: fields_to_be_selected
params.description: Fields to be returned as keys in the resultant struct.

params.name: fields
params.description: Fields in which search has to be performed.

params.name: extra options
params.description: can be passed while executing Lucene query. The options can be: sort, offset, maxResults

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: In the following example, offline search is performed on the property FirstName and first name and last name are returned as keys in the resultant struct.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: In this example, the resultObj in the query is an array of structs. The individual structs contain all the selected fields (passed as third parameter).
examples.code: <cfset resultObj = ormSearchOffline('Java Rocks', 'Book', [bookId, summary, Author.name, title],[title, short_summary])>
